== Xubuntu Website ==

<nowiki>[[Xubuntu/Website/Plans]]</nowiki>

The Xubuntu website can be found at http://xubuntu.org

== Reference ==
=== Current Site Structure ===
The Xubuntu website currently consists of the following primary pages:
* http://www.xubuntu.org/ - The Xubuntu homepage
* http://www.xubuntu.org/news - Contains information from the Xubuntu team about Xubuntu and our releases
* http://www.xubuntu.org/get - Information and links to help users download Xubuntu
* http://www.xubuntu.org/home - Appears to be a duplicate of the main xubuntu.org page
* http://www.xubuntu.org/tour - A page containing screenshots and information about the latest Xubuntu release.  This page currently features information about the Gutsy Gibbon release, and is outdated.
* http://www.xubuntu.org/press - Xubuntu in the press!
* http://www.xubuntu.org/devel - Contains information about how to get involved in Xubuntu development
* http://www.xubuntu.org/links - Links to Xubuntu-related web pages and blogs
* http://www.xubuntu.org/glossary - A list of terms and defintions relevant to Xubuntu
* http://www.xubuntu.org/help - Provides information on Xubuntu support channels
* http://www.xubuntu.org/wiki - An introduction to the Xubuntu wiki
